attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown,
We can't believe that there are any grounds, political or otherwise, on which it is morally acceptable to stand by while so many people perish.  As the military government in Burma clearly lack the political will to distribute aid with anything like the expediency necessary, we insist that our Government intervene, irrespective of the vetoes of other nations.

We call upon this government to deliver aid by all available means, air drops or by sending in militarily protected and escorted aid workers if necessary.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
